articles.author: Lauren Fox, Sarah Ferris, Tami Luhby, Alayna Treene
articles.title: Trump floats raising taxes on the rich to pay for his sweeping tax and spending cuts package - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump said he’s open to hiking taxes on wealthy Americans to help pay for Republicans’ sweeping tax and spending cuts package, but the idea remains hotly contested among GOP lawmakers on Capitol Hill.
articles.content: President Donald Trump said hes open to hiking taxes on wealthy Americans to help pay for Republicans sweeping tax and spending cuts package, but the idea remains hotly contested among GOP lawmakers … [+5984 chars]

articles.author: Christiaan Hetzner
articles.title: Detroit automakers fuming after Trump’s first trade deal gives preferential treatment to imported U.K. cars over their own - Fortune
articles.description: 'It will now be cheaper to import a U.K. vehicle with very little U.S. content than a USMCA compliant vehicle from Mexico or Canada that is half American.'
